item.title: Write a CustomPaginator for django rest framework
item.description: Pagination is essential part for a REST api. Django rest framework provides an easy to way to add pagination to current API and a lot of useful built-in implementations. However, in order to work with a specified frontend component, a customized version is needed. Customizing is easy in DRF, just extends a current one and override it get_paginated_response method. For example, the following one uses the page number pagination ,which means you can pass page=n in the URL to get the nth page.
